messages.subject: preparation
messages.msgSnippet: **I don t think unschoolers are preparing their kids for employment. We re more interested in helping our kids be who they are. Funny thing is, the kids who
messages.messageBody:
**I don't think unschoolers are preparing their kids for employment. We're
more interested in helping our kids be who they are. Funny thing is, the
kids who really *are* who they are end up being quite employable.**

I'm not preparing my kids to make a living, I'm preparing them to make a
life.

Okay, it's got problems, they're already making a life not just preparing for
one, but still, it's catchy, no? :-)

Deborah in IL


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
